tool.name: Confusion Matrix Plot

param.name: infile_input
param.label: Select input data file :
param.help: Input data is a matrix (tabular) where each column is a feature and the last column contains the (true or original) class labels.

param.name: infile_output
param.label: Select predicted data file :
param.help: Predicted data is a matrix (tabular) where each column is a feature and the last column contains the predicted class labels.

data.name: output
data.label: Confusion matrix of tabular data on ${on_string}

tool.help:
**What it does**
Produce a `heatmap plot (confusion matrix) <https://plot.ly/python/heatmaps/>`_ from tabular files. The input data contains the original/true class labels (last column) and the predicted data contains the predicted class labels (last column). The true and predicted class labels are plotted against each other. The diagonal of this heatmap shows the correctly predicted data. The plot is buried in a html file which provides rich interactive features. Image can be saved in various format, such as 'png', 'svg', 'jpeg' and so on.
